metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16128 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The aptdaemon DBus interface disclosed file existence disclosure by setting Terminal/DebconfSocket properties, aka GHSL-2020-192 and GHSL-2020-196. This affected versions prior to 1.1.1+bzr982-0ubuntu34.1, 1.1.1+bzr982-0ubuntu32.3, 1.1.1+bzr982-0ubuntu19.5, 1.1.1+bzr982-0ubuntu14.5.

criterions.comment: aptdaemon: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
